short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A simple chrome extension that let you access journal through HKU library resources (HKU ID needed).

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An extension that redirect you from the journal page to the HKU library portal.  You need to login the HKU library. The extension will  automatically parse the current URL of the current paper page to the HKU library address.
